title: An apologeticall letter to a person of quality, concerning a scandalous and malicious passage, in a conference lately held betwixt an inquisitor at White-Hall and Mr Anthony Sadler, published in his Inquisitio Anglicana. / Written by Jo. Hall Bishop of Norwich, in vindication of himself.
author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for N.B. and are to be sold at the Marigold in S. Pauls Churchyard,
